broadwick.odesolver

Class OdeSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.odesolver.OdeSolver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RungeKutta4

    public abstract class OdeSolver
extends Object
    A base class for all ODE solvers.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OdeSolver

        public OdeSolver(Ode ode,
                 double tStart,
                 double tEnd,
                 double stepSize)
        Create the solver object with initial consitions.
        Parameters:
        ode - the ode object containing the specification of the ode.
        tStart - the start time (the independent variable is assumed to be time)
        tEnd - the end time (the independent variable is assumed to be time)
        stepSize - the size of the step to be used in the solver.

    • Method Detail

      • addObserver

        public final void addObserver(Observer observer)
        Add an observer to the engines list of observers.
        Parameters:
        observer - the observer.

      • registerNewTheta

        public final void registerNewTheta(Observer obs,
                                   double thetaTime,
                                   Object event)
        Register a new theta event that is triggered at a given time.
        Parameters:
        obs - the observers which is registering.
        thetaTime - the time the theta event occurs.
        event - the theta event.

      • doThetaEvent

        protected final void doThetaEvent()
        Gets called when the simulator reaches the predetermined time of a theta event. All the observers for the events that are configured for this time are notified and given a list of events that are triggered.

      • getNextThetaEventTime

        public final double getNextThetaEventTime()
        Theta defines a moment, where the simulator has to invoke theta of a observers. It is used e.g. to determine the amounts of species at one moments. Extending class just have to call Simulator#doThetaEvent() which basically calls the observers.
        Returns:
        the theta

      • getDependetVariablesAsCsv

        public final String getDependetVariablesAsCsv()
        Get a csv representation of the current state of the dependent variables.
        Returns:
        a csv string.

      • getDependentVariables

        public final List<Double> getDependentVariables()
        Get the dependent variables.
        Returns:
        an array of the dependent variables.

      • run

        public abstract void run()
        Solve the system of ODEs.
